alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued September 22 at 2:30PM EDT until September 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Inland Worcester and Maryland Beaches Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/03 PM 3.5 1.0 1.1 1 NONE 23/02 AM 4.4 1.9 2.4 1 MINOR 23/02 PM 4.9 2.4 2.4 1 MINOR 24/02 AM 3.6 1.1 1.7 1 NONE 24/04 PM 3.7 1.2 1.0 1 NONE 25/04 AM 2.9 0.4 0.7 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
